title.narrative: PLANNING, MONITORING AND EVALUATION

description.narrative: Planning, monitoring and evaluation, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews, Evaluation, Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The country programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

participating-org.narrative: DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH OF KYZYLORDA O
SPC FOR THE DEVELOPMENT OF SOCIAL REHABILITATION

sector.narrative: Data analysis, including situation analysis and update

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Planning, monitoring and evaluation

description.narrative: The country office started implementation of the first year of the new cycle with the development of workplans with key ministries contributing to the UN joint result groups under the UNSDCF. Programme implementation and budget utilization was effectively monitored and 100 per cent of assurance activities and PSEA assessments were completed. To ensure the generation of robust evidence and data collection, UNICEF developed and implemented a new Knowledge Management Strategy and Implementation Plan for 2021-2023, completed two evaluations and five studies and worked closely with the World Bank, UN agencies, Economic Research Institute and National Statistics Bureau. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:19/01/2022
